item.title: Jersey approves assisted dying law
item.description:
The Crown dependency is now the second part of the British Isles where assisted dying has been fully approved.

item.title: Number of young people out of work or education edges closer to one million
item.description:
People at the start of their careers are particularly affected by the UK's weak job market.

item.title: Met apologises to Lord Speaker after Mandelson tip-off error
item.description:
Lord Mandelson's lawyers said police arrested the peer because of a "baseless" suggestion he was planning to move abroad.
